alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued March 22 at 11:44AM PDT until March 22 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 145 PM PDT. * At 1142 AM PDT, several dust channels were located along Interstate 10 between mile markers 124 and 128, or 19 miles east of Desert Center, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 124 and 128. This dust channel will remain over mainly rural areas of Riverside County. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
